original_text: And the priest that is anointed shall bring of the bullock's blood to the tabernacle of the congregation:
korean_text: 기름 부음을 받은 제사장은 그 수송아지의 피를 가지고 회막에 들어가서

sentences.original_text: And the priest that is anointed
shall bring of the bullock's blood
to the tabernacle of the congregation
